a22.l: select case when REGEXP_LIKE( :template_name, '^[a-z0-9]+$') then 'T' else 'F' end as valid_name from dual

template_validname.a14: iif(template_validname={F},{Special Characters and Space are not allowed in template name},{T})
template_validname.a59: POSTGRES: select case when :template_name ~* '[^a-z0-9_]'='true' then 'F' else 'T' end from dual

a22.l: select cast(case when caption='letterformat' then 'Letter format' when caption='reportformat' then 'Report format' else caption end as varchar(50)) frmt,caption from axfastlink a where transid = 'axftp' and istemplate='T' order by 1
select to_char(caption||'-('||name||')') fcaption,name ntransid from tstructs order by 1

tstructsql.a59:
pOSTGRES
select concat('select ',string_agg(a.fname,','),' from ',b.tablename,' order by 1') from

a22.l: select to_char(sqlname),sqltext from (select sqlname,sqltext from Axdirectsql where cancel ='F' and sqlname not in('Fast_Print_Master','Fast_Print_Detail') union all select 'Form data',null from dual)

select cast(psize as varchar(20)) psize,pheight,pwidth from (SELECT 'Custom input' AS psize, 0 AS pheight, 0 AS pwidth FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'A5', 210, 148 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'A4', 297, 210 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Letter 1', 431.8, 279.4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Letter 2', 356, 216 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Letter 3', 279.4, 215.9 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Letter 4', 267, 184 FROM DUAL)a order by 1

paper_size.a59:
oRACLE
select cast(psize as varchar(20)) psize,pheight,pwidth from (SELECT 'Custom input' AS ps

a22.l: select to_char(fcaption) fcaption, fname,ord from ( select 'None' fcaption,'None' fname,1 ord from dual union all select caption||'-(,'||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :form_name and (datatype ='i' or lower(fname) like 'axpfile_%') and lower(fname) not like 'axpfilepath_%' UNION ALL select caption||'-('||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and lower(fname) like 'aximp%' union all SELECT regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level), regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level),3 from dual where length( :mssqltext ) > 1 connect by regexp_substr( :mssqltext,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )a order by ord,fname

select to_char(fcaption) fcaption, fname,ord from ( select 'None' fcaption,'None' fname,1 ord from dual union all select caption||'-(,'||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :form_name and (datatype ='i' or lower(fname) like 'axpfile_%') and lower(fname) not like 'axpfilepath_%' UNION ALL select caption||'-('||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and lower(fname) like 'aximp%' union all SELECT regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level), regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level),3 from dual where length( :mssqltext ) > 1 connect by regexp_substr( :mssqltext,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )a order by ord,fname

select to_char(fcaption) fcaption, fname,ord from ( select 'None' fcaption,'None' fname,1 ord from dual union all select caption||'-(,'||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :form_name and (datatype ='i' or lower(fname) like 'axpfile_%') and lower(fname) not like 'axpfilepath_%' UNION ALL select caption||'-('||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and lower(fname) like 'aximp%' union all SELECT regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level), regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level),3 from dual where length( :mssqltext ) > 1 connect by regexp_substr( :mssqltext,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )a order by ord,fname

select to_char(fcaption) fcaption, fname,ord from ( select 'None' fcaption,'None' fname,1 ord from dual union all select caption||'-(,'||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :form_name and (datatype ='i' or lower(fname) like 'axpfile_%') and lower(fname) not like 'axpfilepath_%' UNION ALL select caption||'-('||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and lower(fname) like 'aximp%' union all SELECT regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level), regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level),3 from dual where length( :mssqltext ) > 1 connect by regexp_substr( :mssqltext,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )a order by ord,fname

select to_char(sqlname) sqlname,sqltext,null dmy,ord from( select sqlname,sqltext ,2 ord from Axdirectsql where cancel ='F' and sqlname not in('Fast_Print_Master','Fast_Print_Detail') and 'Letter format' != :form_templateui union all select caption||'-('||dname||')',to_nclob(dname) dname,1 ord from axpdc where asgrid='T' and tstruct = :form_name and 'Letter format' != :form_templateui union all select 'NA',to_nclob( :tstructsql),3 ord from dual where 'Letter format' =:form_templateui )a order by ord,sqlname

detail_data_source.a14: iif(ISEmpty(detail_source)={F} & ISEmpty(detail_data_source)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select ('select '||listagg(a.fname,',') within group(order by a.fname)||' from '||b.tablename||' order by 1')as sqltext from axpflds a join axpdc b on a.tstruct=b.tstruct and a.dcname=b.dname where b.dname= :griddcno_datasql and a.savevalue='T' and b.asgrid='T' and datatype <>'i' and '1' = :dtlsrccnd and a.tstruct= :form_name group by b.tablename

SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(get_sql_columns( :detail_datasource_sql_text), '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) from dual where :detail_data_source is not null CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (get_sql_columns( :detail_datasource_sql_text),'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL

select to_char(fcaption) fcaption, fname,ord from ( select 'None' fcaption,'None' fname,1 ord from dual union all select caption||'-(,'||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :form_name and (datatype ='i' or lower(fname) like 'axpfile_%') and lower(fname) not like 'axpfilepath_%' UNION ALL select caption||'-('||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and lower(fname) like 'aximp%' union all SELECT regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level), regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level),3 from dual where length( :mssqltext ) > 1 connect by regexp_substr( :mssqltext,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )a order by ord,fname

select to_char(fcaption) fcaption, fname,ord from ( select 'None' fcaption,'None' fname,1 ord from dual union all select caption||'-(,'||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :form_name and (datatype ='i' or lower(fname) like 'axpfile_%') and lower(fname) not like 'axpfilepath_%' UNION ALL select caption||'-('||fname||')',fname,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and lower(fname) like 'aximp%' union all SELECT regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level), regexp_substr(get_sql_columns( :mssqltext),'[^,]+',1,level),3 from dual where length( :mssqltext ) > 1 connect by regexp_substr( :mssqltext,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )a order by ord,fname

select to_char(sqlname) sqlname,sqltext,null dmy,ord from( select sqlname,to_char(sqltext)sqltext,2 ord from Axdirectsql where cancel ='F' and sqlname not in('Fast_Print_Master','Fast_Print_Detail') and sqlsrccnd = 4 union all select caption||'-('||dname||')',dname,1 ord from axpdc where asgrid='T' and tstruct = :form_name)a order by ord,sqlname

SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(get_sql_columns( CASE WHEN :annxscnd ='2' THEN :annx_datasql ELSE 'select null from dual' END), '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) from dual where '2' = :annxscnd CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (get_sql_columns( CASE WHEN :annxscnd ='2' THEN :annx_datasql ELSE 'select null from dual' END ),'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL union all select a.fname from axpflds a where a.dcname= :annx_datasql and a.savevalue='T' and datatype <>'i' and a.tstruct= :form_name and '1' = :annxscnd
